website_summaries.verdict: Bursting with detail from the villain’s satellite down to the mini figure outfits, this set is great for kids to play with, or just to put on display.
pros: With Batman, Batwoman, and the Batjet, along with villain OMAC and his satellite (featuring a light-up “eye” brick), what’s not to like?
Batjet is highly detailed for its size
Batteries are included for satellite eye
Great to display and fun to play with
Perhaps best of all, no stickers to deal with
cons: Batman’s cape tends to bunch up at the neck
Kids younger than 7 may need help building

customer_reviews.title: Well Loved Gift
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our nephew's 10th birthday. It was a big hit. He had it opened and was ready to assemble right away. The Batman, Batwoman, and Omac characters are fun additions to his Lego collection, and I am sure his brothers will be attempting to use them too. The light up brick is a nice feature that makes the Brother Eye bot more sinister as the kids used their imaginations to battle. Omac's little shooting pieces were fun. One of the best parts is the bat plane. Overall great kit that can stand alone or enhance an existing collection.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great little LEGO set for a DC and/or Batman fans.
customer_reviews.text: Great little LEGO set for a DC and/or Batman fans. The ship was an easy and pleasant build. My kids were able to built this set with ease and quickly. Love the fact that Brother Eye build has an included Light Brick—definitely adds a nice play feature to the set. This set includes 3 minifigures and all look very well done. Great set for both kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful opening all the packages
customer_reviews.text: My friend's kids loved this LEGO set that I got them for Christmas. I do have to say that you have to be careful not to open all the packs, otherwise you will be mixing up the pieces and have a hard time finding what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vo

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult finding a LEGO set that my nephew didn’t have, but this one was a older one. It came in great shape and was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: It's Lego and it's batman: can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old boy loves it. Of course, to assemble it he needs my help, but he feels free to build any other stuff too, like Lego is supposed to be. A lot of cool pieces. We've built several things with it: a robot (search for it's alternative build in YouTube), a chopter, a pirate ship, a cage, and so on. My only issue is with the light brick, as I just couldn't make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Tomy Inhauser

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love lego batman and had no clue the brother eye lights up which was a nice touch. Comes with batman, batwoman and omac which my some seemed to love.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Poley

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Girft For 7 yr-old.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves Lego. He has many different sets but he was thrilled when he received his first Batman set for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Caribeazul

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun gift for my 8 year old grandson. He played with it a long time. Usually, he assembles them and is ready to do another one. This one he actually played with several times.
customer_reviews.author: McNurlin

customer_reviews.title: He loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for 9 year old nephew! Smooth transaction, thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift for a 6 year old. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: michelle sanford bethea

customer_reviews.title: Batman
customer_reviews.text: 12 year old grandson love legos and he was happy with this one
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: LEGO love
customer_reviews.text: Legos make any LEGO kid happy! Too bad he is so fast lol

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this Lego set and the price was right.

customer_reviews.title: Good set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a great set and made my nephew very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: love the set
customer_reviews.text: good set for play and shelf and really good mimifigers Batmans fig is good not the best i have seen but good. Batwoman's fig is really good and well made, the set is well made and sturdy i would get this if you like Batman brother eye or Batwoman

product_meta.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes Batman: Brother Eye Takedown 76111 Building Kit (269 Piece)
product_meta.description: Join Batman and Batwoman’s battle to bring down Brother Eye and defeat the cyborg OMAC. This exciting LEGO DC Super Heroes 76111 Batman: Brother Eye Takedown set features the Batjet with an opening minifigure cockpit, stud shooters and attachment points for the new-for-August-2018 Bat weapons and elements. It also includes Brother Eye with a light brick eye element, adjustable talons and a stud shooter, plus 3 toy figures.
feature_bullets: Build the Batjet, with 2 stud shooters, and Brother Eye, with LEGO light brick eye and a stud shooter, then team up with Batman and Batwoman for battle
This popular toy includes 3 toy figures: a Batman figure, Batwoman figure and OMAC figure, plus assorted Bat weapons
The buildable Batman plane toy measures over 2” (6cm) high, 9” (24cm) long and 6” (16cm) wide. Brother Eye measures over 2” (6cm) high, 7” (18cm) long and 8” (22cm) wide
269 pieces – DC Universe Batman and Batwoman toy for boys and girls aged between 6 and 12 and for fans and kids of all ages
This LEGO DC Super Heroes Batman: Brother Eye Takedown 76111 Batman playset can be built together with all other original LEGO building sets and LEGO bricks for creative play

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars211 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
